items.sentence: Tom has been getting up early for the past three weeks.
Aren't you going to tell me about what happened to Tom?
There were some strange-looking people snooping around.
How long has it been since you've gone hiking with Tom?
How often should you change the air filter in your car?
I have a fever and a headache. I think I'm getting ill.
I grew up in a small town where everyone knew everyone.
The last thing I'd ever want to do is to hurt you, Tom.
It didn't escape me that Tom was contradicting himself.
When I get home, the first thing I do is wash my hands.
